00022 #region Usings
00023 using System.IO;
00024 using System.IO.Compression;
00025 #endregion
00026 
00027 namespace Utilities.Compression
00028 {
00033     public static class GZip
00034     {
00035         #region Static Functions
00036 
00037 
00038 
00039 
00040 
00041         public static byte[] Compress(byte[] Bytes)
00042         {
00043             using (MemoryStream Stream = new MemoryStream())
00044             {
00045                 using (GZipStream ZipStream = new GZipStream(Stream, CompressionMode.Compress, true))
00046                 {
00047                     ZipStream.Write(Bytes, 0, Bytes.Length);
00048                     ZipStream.Close();
00049                     return Stream.ToArray();
00050                 }
00051             }
00052         }
00053 
00059         public static byte[] Decompress(byte[] Bytes)
00060         {
00061             using (MemoryStream Stream = new MemoryStream())
00062             {
00063                 using (GZipStream ZipStream = new GZipStream(new MemoryStream(Bytes), CompressionMode.Decompress, true))
00064                 {
00065                     byte[] Buffer = new byte[4096];
00066                     while (true)
00067                     {
00068                         int Size = ZipStream.Read(Buffer, 0, Buffer.Length);
00069                         if (Size > 0) Stream.Write(Buffer, 0, Size);
00070                         else break;
00071                     }
00072                     ZipStream.Close();
00073                     return Stream.ToArray();
00074                 }
00075             }
00076         }
00077 
00078         #endregion
00079     }
00080 }
